nodes.text: Imperial Replenishment Fleet DK-209 was a fuel replenishment fleet that served in the Imperial Navy of the Galactic Empire. A key part of the fleet was the Field Secured Container Vessel Black Ice, which was an enormous fuel transport assigned to the fleet that was around five Imperial-class Star Destroyers in length. Black Ice was stolen by the Alliance to Restore the Republic after the destruction of the Choah Belt fuel refinery by the Empire, although Black Ice was soon destroyed.
